official_title: A bill to terminate the authorizations for Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, and Clifty Creek Dam and Reservoir in the State of Indiana.

summary.text: Terminates the authorizations of Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, and Clifty Creek Dam and Reservoir, Indiana.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authorizations for Lafayette Dam and Reservoir, Big Pine Dam and Reservoir, and Clifty Creek Dam and Reservoir in the State of Indiana.
